MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY21 postcode area of Welshpool, affecting properties in Berriew and surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the repairs required to a damaged piece of equipment on the overhead line network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:11PM on 1st November 2020.
